name: Stormcloak Soldier
stunts: Battle Cry: +2 to Attack when fighting alongside other Stormcloaks
For Skyrim: Once per scene, ignore one consequence to continue fighting
Squad Tactics: When fighting as a group (3+), each soldier gains +1 to Fight
notes: Stormcloak soldiers are passionate Nord rebels fighting for Skyrim's independence. They gain strength from fighting together and their devotion to their cause makes them fearless. Individually they have +1 to combat skills, but when fighting as a squad (3 or more), they gain +2 bonuses due to coordinated tactics and morale.
combat_tactics: Stormcloaks fight aggressively, using their Battle Cry to inspire allies. They prefer melee combat and shield walls. When outnumbered, they'll regroup at defensible positions. They never surrender if their Jarl or commanding officer is present.

loot.group_loot: Stormcloak camps contain supplies worth 30-100 gold and weapons cache

variants.name: Stormcloak Officer
variants.changes: Increase Fight to Great (+4), add stunt 'Rally the Troops: +2 to Provoke when commanding Stormcloaks in battle', add third mental stress box

variants.name: Stormcloak Scout
variants.changes: Replace Physique with Stealth at Good (+3), add stunt 'Quick Retreat: +2 to Athletics when disengaging from combat'

social_interaction: Stormcloaks are passionate about Skyrim's freedom and hate the Empire and Thalmor. They respect strength and honor. Can be reasoned with using arguments about Skyrim's sovereignty or Talos worship. They distrust outsiders but respect fellow Nords.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Direct, uses Norse-inspired phrases, passionate about freedom
